properties.title: The Jakarta-Taglibs Project: 'Standard' taglib: JSP[tm] Standard Tag Library (JSTL) implementation

section.name: 'Standard' Taglib
section.p: The JSR-052 Expert Group, operating under the Java Community Process, will be hosting the reference implementation of the JSP Standard Tag Library (JSTL) at Jakarta Taglibs.

NOTE: JSTL requires a JSP container that supports the Java Servlet 2.3 and JavaServer Pages 1.2 specifications. Jakarta Tomcat 4 supports the new specifications. The Standard 1.0 taglib has been tested with Tomcat 4.0.3 and Tomcat 4.0.4B2.
